tourBios.carHigh: 2010: Finished T77 at the 2010 U.S. Open at Pebble Beach. 2009: Played 13 events in his rookie season on the Web.com Tour. Made four cuts to finish No. 101 on the money list. Best week was a solo third at the Mexico Open. 2007: Member of the European Tour but made only three cuts in 15 starts.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played in the 2005 Walker Cup. Missed the cut at the 2005 Open Championship at St. Andrews, where he competed as an amateur. Was the 2004 European Amateur champion. Won the World Junior in 2002.
tourBios.personal: Lists David Leadbetter as an instructor...Favorite course to play is Valderrama in Spain and would like to play Augusta National. Favorite pro team is soccer's Arsenal Football Club in England. His favorite city to visit is Sydney, Australia, and his favorite place to vacation is anywhere with a beach...Would round out his dream foursome with Jack Nicklaus, Ben Hogan and Arnold Palmer.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 3rd in 2009 at the Mexico Open Presented by Corona Light.
